subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Blackburn Rovers, which was bought by a poultry company in 2010, is in danger of being demoted to the third tier of English soccer, where it last played in 1980.
snippet: Blackburn Rovers, which was bought by a poultry company in 2010, is in danger of being demoted to the third tier of English soccer, where it last played in 1980.
